ingredients: 1 lb. chorizo sausage, cut into 1⁄2-inch rounds
2 large fennel bulbs, trimmed and thinly sliced crosswise
1 orange zest strip, 2 inches long and 1 inch wide
1 1⁄2 lb. halibut fillets, cut into strips 1 1⁄2 inches thick
1 lb. medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
1⁄4 tsp. cayenne pepper, or to taste
